name: नामपद-समूह
description: Noun form unity includes the inflectional unity of prakr̥ti-pratyaya. prakr̥ti includes samāsa words.

name: क्रिया-समूह
description: Verb form unity includes the unity of main verb, modal verb and auxiliary verb.

name: विशेषनाम-समूह
description: Named entity unity includes unity of words that can be considered as a proper name.
